messages.title: you can make the difference
messages.content: Britain needs change. You will soon have the chance to make that change happen.
We need a new government with the energy, leadership and values to get the country moving, and our economy back on track. We have bold plans to change our country for the better.
Some of our plans won’t cost money but will need real energy - like our determination to improve school discipline.
And where our plans will cost money, like stopping Labour's jobs tax, we've found the money from other areas like cutting government waste.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stopping Labour's jobs tax, cutting government waste.

issues.economy: Stopping Labour's jobs tax, cutting government waste.

leaflet.personalStatement: Only the Conservatives can bring the change Britain needs. I hope you'll take the chance to vote for that change.

images.caption: David Cameron writing, with text supporting change and the Conservative Party.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet emphasizes the need for change in Britain and highlights Conservative Party's plans to improve the economy and education. It also targets Labour's policies directly.
